phrases: We are sick and tired of you dodging the issue!
I am not dodging the issue!
I am just saying that we should not do anything rash until the situation clears up.
We should be hearing
from the Kuhouin head, my grandfather, soon.
All we need is a little more patience!
Come on!
Face the facts!
We do not officially exist anymore!
Do not you get it?
They are going to kill us along with the virus!
We are all going to die!
It is all over!
Hey, cut it out!
Nobody knows that for sure!
That is right.
Also, do not shout.
This is why I requested that no one takes the floor until they have the microphone.
The way I see it,
our biggest problem right now is that we do not know anything about the situation.
Should not someone take responsibility
and inspect the wall enclosing Loop 7?
Yeah!
He is right!
Nanba's right!
You go!
Why does the president bother taking guys like that seriously?
I do not know if it is integrity or just stupidity...
She is just trying to hear everybody out!
What is wrong with that?
Nothing, but only we were in a peaceful time.
What is wrong, Shu?
Nothing...
I was just wondering what Gai would do at a time like this.
Please!
Please do something!
I want to see my mom and dad!
What we are saying
is that we want you to decide on a course of action.
If you ask me, Grandpa will come and save us, so wait for him
is not something a leader should say.
Am I right?
Good point.
What are you, a kid?
Per Article 32, Section 3 of the student council charter,
I am hereby filing a no-confidence resolution against the president
and requesting that we elect a new president.
The reality of the destruction around us fills our mind
The raging rain sounds like a storm of tears
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your voice was given to you to tell others how you feel
All living things
bear witness to my song
Your heart contains all its truth
Even when all you see in your path are storms
remember that your strength is no coincidence
It is time to distribute the vaccine.
Everyone allotted a dose this week,
report to the student council room on the fourth floor before lunch hour ends.
Here you go.
Take good care of it.
I think the dam's finally burst.
Dam?
What dam?
This is the school's unofficial website, Tennozu Underground.
Take a look.
The internet is back?!
Wow, it is.
The jamming suddenly lifted on just the school's local network, so the internet came back up.
But, we are still cut off from the outside.
Let me see, let me see!
They are really going after the president.
But she is working hard!
That is just mean!
I can see their point, though.
I mean, she is really not cut out to lead.
Hey!
That is a horrible thing to say!
She is one of us, and we care about her!
One of us?
We are only together because of the circumstances.
You are not cute at all!
I am so sorry!
Tsugumi!
What is her problem?
Gather as much information you can on what is happening outside and on people who want to leave.
We will confront her with that at the assembly.
Whatever.
Why do not we just kill her?
Do not get hasty.
We can play our trump card whenever we want.
Hey, Inori.
You do not have any family, right?
Have you ever felt lonely?
Only once.
The one time when Shu was not there and I was cold.
Gai told me that is loneliness.
Thanks for sharing that.
Are you lonely?
Tsugumi, are you lonely?
N-No, of course not!
I mean, sure, the Undertakers are gone...
But I was living on my own even before I joined them.
I am way past being lonely.
Yeah...
I have always been alone, so...
So you do not have to worry about it, Shu!
R-Right!
Perfect timing.
I will give you this.
Genomic Resonance Gauge?
Yep.
To put it bluntly, it is like a gadget for measuring the strength of Voids.
It was just lying on the ground near the truck those guys attacked us in yesterday.
Seems like the bigger the number, the more powerful the Void.
I see...
Impressive!
Wh-What!?
What is it?
Come to think of it, what is Tsugumi's Void?
Well, I have never drawn it out...
Think of the situation we are in.
It is best to get an idea of everyone is Voids, is not it?
Do not worry.
It only hurts for a second.
It hurts!?
All right, Dr. Ouma, have at it!
Hey Wait
Okay then.
Sorry, Tsugumi.
St-Stop!
No!
Report.
Yes, sir.
We are deploying a mop-up team based on your strategy.
Next, we will form a ring around the area and proceed to purify, then shrink the blockade zone.
As for our main force, I have strategically stationed the Ghost unit formed from the data you gave me.
Now then, Mr. President...
Begin.
Yes Sir!
Now beginning Operation Purify Tokyo!
This is an announcement from the new Japanese government.
As of midnight tonight, we are shrinking the quarantined area.
Anyone who attempts to venture outside the red lines
will be purified on sight, so please be careful.
I do not like this.
President's orders or not, there is no love in this kind of killing.
And that Ghost unit they are not connected from here, are they?
And they are not on scene, either...
So, where are the operators?
That is top secret.
Is it true!?
It is happening at Koenji.
So the government's started a massacre at Koenji?
So the government's started a massacre at Koenji?
A massacre...
I heard everyone who tried looking for help were killed!
I heard everyone who tried looking for help were killed!
I heard they lynched everyone there!
Scary...
I heard they lynched everyone there!
Scary...
Things are really getting really bad now.
It is all over now...
Everyone is dead.
It is all over now...
Everyone is dead.
Nanba.
What are you up to at this time of night?
According to rumors, there is been a massacre at Koenji.
What now?
Do you still want to wait and do nothing?
Rowan.
Do you know what brought down the ancient city-states of Greece?
In one word.
I am afraid I was a physics major.
Demagogy.
Look at what happens when we stop jamming their signals.
And...
Now, I wonder how they will react.
You are a perverse man, Sir.
Please, do not compliment me so much.
Thanks a lot, Gramps.
We could not have stayed on the run any longer.
How can we repay your kindness?
All lines of communication and transport into the city center
were shut down as soon as Keido took office
but there should still be plenty of survivors left.
I want to save them.
It will be our pleasure to assist you.
Hey, look!
This is from someone who managed to get outside!
If you hand over the members of the Undertakers...
Student Body Meeting Today!
A vote of no confidence in current president Arisa Kuhouin
will be held, along with the election of the next president.
Shu, did you hear about Koenji?
Yeah.
It might be a rumor, but...
But it is definitely something the Anti Bodies would do.
I wonder what is going to happen to our school...
It is okay.
It will not get any worse than this.
We have got everyone with us.
Also, I will fight if I have to.
Okay.
But, if you get hurt, I promise I will heal you with my Void!
Thanks!
But Shu, do not you want to be the leader?
Why do not you run for student council president?
Nah, that would not work out.
I am the last person who should be giving people orders.
That is not true!
You have just convinced yourself that is the case.
You can be a king, Shu.
Now you are what I would call a really soothing girl!
Just kidding.
You sound like you are feeling better.
Well yeah, but being defiant's the only way to deal
with other people seeing a Void like that.
There!
It is the Undertakers!
No!
Do not let her get away!
Confess!
You are a part of the Undertakers, are not you!?
It says here that members of the Undertakers have tattoos on their backs.
Okay, check it out.
Stop that at once!
What are you jerks doing!?
Shut up!
Do not get in our way!
Get your hands off her!
What is going on...?
We have got trouble, Shu!
There is a rumor online saying that turning over
Undertaker members will let you get past the blockade!
That is...!
Where are Inori and Ayase?
I-It is okay.
I am only going to check whether you have got a tattoo.
Okay?
I will go check out the old building!
Got it.
Be careful, Tsugumi!
Inori...
What is wrong, Shu?
There is an awful rumor spreading.
Did anyone attack you?
It is okay, I have not seen anyone else here.
Oh...
That is good, then.
Let us go!
You know, I thought something was up ever since I first saw you.
What is your year and class?
Out of my way.
Bingo, eh?!
You bitch!
Missile Kick!
Let us go, Aya!
Why, you!
Aya!
Why did you come back?!
As if I could live without you!
Well, are not you cool!
We are moving up our plans.
A student body meeting will be held in ten minutes.
All students, please assemble in the gymnasium immediately.
We must not be led astray by false rumors.
Help will come if we wait for it.
What we need to do now is weather the storm!
You always say that!
Do not you have anything else to say?!
That stance is not going to fly with the other students anymore.
How can you say that?
Do not you feel bad for the president?!
Ayase and Tsugumi are not here either?
President...
What we want to hear right now is how to avoid getting slaughtered.
We only need to hand over the Undertakers and we can get out of here, right?
That is a false rumor!
There are not any Undertaker members here, either!
Oh, but there are!
In fact, we discovered some ourselves!
Both of them?!
They are wearing our school's uniforms,
but has anyone seen them before the blockade?
Undertaker members have tattoos on their backs, you know!
Really?
Well, maybe we should try looking for them!
Stop it!
The Undertakers are a criminal organization that has committed bioterrorism!
We cannot let them go unpunished!
So...
We will just have to do it!
Whoa there.
You better be a good girl.
Do it!
Do it!
Do it!
Stop it
This is bad!
Kuhouin's totally lost control of the room!
If we hand over the Undertakers, we will all be saved!
And you know that is a wonderful thing!
Wait!
Hey, this guy...
He is the one who beat an Endlave yesterday...
Ouma Shu!
Y-You are...
Take your hands off Ayase.
I am a member of the Undertakers, too.
Sorry, but could you let me handle this, everyone?
I have an idea.
W-Wait a second!
I brought some Undertakers members!
See?
There are still lots of students taking shelter in the school.
We will hand these guys over!
So please, let us go!
That runt...
She was with the Undertakers?
Go on, hurry up.
H-Hey, that is careless!
So now can I...?
Y-You are kidding!
But
Why?
Handing over the Undertakers should solve everything!
What the hell is going on?!
You get it now, do not you?
Relying on the government will not work.
And you understand Shu's Void power too, do not you?
This is my Void: the doll-making Hand Scanner!
The human copies I create with it
are just like the real thing, and you can control them remotely.
Too awesome, right?!
To me, you all looked afraid because there was so much you did not understand.
So I made one fact perfectly clear.
Now we can move forward.
I want you all to calm down.
What the hell?
The government and your powers...
It is all fake!
Did not I tell you to calm down?
Do not make me angry.
Just like you saw yesterday,
we have a way of fighting.
So rest easy regarding that aspect.
That is why I want whoever's going to be the leader to really think.
To think of a way we will all be saved.
That is all.
Excuse me.
Hold up, Shu.
This is not over yet.
Hey everybody!
I think Shu's absolutely right!
So let me ask you.
Who on that stage would make the best leader?
Shu!
Ouma Shu!
Shu!
Yahiro, what are you...?
Everyone who agrees Ouma
Shu should be our new president, clap your hands!
Yahiro, what was that for?
I will help you with the job.
Give it a try.
Do not you think this is what you can do right now?
What?
What did you just say, Yahiro?
We will rank all the students on a scale of A to F
based on their genomic resonance values,
and you, Shu, will reign over them.
From now on, the value of a person lies in the value of their Void.
You could call it a Void ranking system.
